item.description:
Through this dynamic solo meditation you will:

♦ Awaken your sexual/ life force Energy!
♦ De-Stress!
♦ Strengthen your Immune System!
♦ Release the past!
♦ Ignite your Clarity!
♦ Embody your Personal Power!
♦ Realize your Ability to Manifest!

Develop your solo practice within the context of a potent, supportive energy field.

No previous experience necessary. Beginners welcome!
Wear loose, comfortable clothing. Mats will be provided. Bring a water bottle.

Fridays, 7:30-9:30pm

*Allow up to half hour to find parking. Bring quarters for meters.

3/12, 4/9, 5/7,* 6/11
(2nd Friday of the month, except *1st Fri)

$20 prepay through PayPal by 3/10, or
$25 cash or check at the door

Brynn Bishop is a Bodyworker, Tantric Educator and Intimacy Coach with over twenty years experience in the fields of Somatics, Spirituality and Consciousness Relating. Brynn assists people in increasing their capacity for Intimacy and Pleasure, and in accessing their full Aliveness and Passion!

For a free phone consultation, contact Brynn Bishop via email (organizer) or at 415-244-1652
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the door to the left of the Burren Pub. We are upstairs at the back.
item.name: Monthly Chakra Loop Breath Journey
